sources.title: Dead Are Countless (1969) Spaghetti Western Movie | by Rafael Romero Marchent
sources.description:
After witnessing his father’s murder by soldiers as a child, Johnny grows up consumed by vengeance,. Years later he has grown up to be an outlaw and targets soldiers whenever he can. Lieutenant Garringo is sent out to arrest Johnny, resulting in a deadly confrontation between the two.

Garringo (also known as Dead Are Countless) is a 1969 Spanish-Italian Chorizo-Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Rafael Romero Marchent

Main actors:
Anthony Steffen - Lieutenant Garringo
Peter Lee Lawrence - Johnny
Solvi Stubing - Julie
José Bódalo - Sheriff
Raf Baldassarre - Damon
Luis Marín - Pete, Bounty Hunter
Marta Monterrey - Nancy Grayson
Barta Barry - Wilson
Rossana Rovere - Sarah
Frank Braña - Bill
Luis Induni - Doctor Grayson
Guillermo Méndez - Johnny's Henchman
Tito García - Ted


00:00 - The film opens with Johnny as a boy witnessing his father being unalived, sparking his desire for revenge.
01:43 - Opening credits - full movie with subtitles
03:45 - Left for dead, the continuation of Johnnys childhood / origin story
07:35 - Johnny now all grown up: showcases his sharpshooting skills, winning admiration and setting the stage for conflict.
29:45 - Lieutenant Garringo is tasked with capturing Johnny, initiating a tense pursuit.
45:12 - A pivotal showdown occurs between Johnny and a local rival, escalating tensions.
1:00:03 - Johnny discovers betrayal among his allies, leading to internal conflict within the group.
1:15:27 - The final confrontation between Garringo and Johnny unfolds, filled with dramatic tension.
1:19:30 - Garringo reflects on the futility of vengeance, adding emotional depth to the story.
1:25:07 - The film concludes with a somber resolution, emphasizing the cyclical nature of violence.


Available with French & Spanish audio

@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: As a small boy Johnny saw his father killed by soldiers. Years later he has grown up to be an outlaw and is killing soldiers whenever he can. Lieutenant Garringo (Steffen) is sent out to arrest Johnny (Lawrence) and bring him back alive.
metadata.Writer: Arpad DeRiso, Joaquín Luis Romero Marchent, Giovanni Scolaro
metadata.Actors: Anthony Steffen, Peter Lee Lawrence, Solvi Stubing
